verbs.description: VOLCANO , Hawaii — [ARG0: Hawaii Gov. David Ige] [V: says] [ARG1: President Donald Trump has approved his request for a presidential disaster declaration for the Big Island as the state copes with Kilauea volcano 's eruption] .

VOLCANO , Hawaii — Hawaii Gov. David Ige says President Donald Trump [V: has] approved his request for a presidential disaster declaration for the Big Island as the state copes with Kilauea volcano 's eruption .

VOLCANO , Hawaii — Hawaii Gov. David Ige says [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: approved] [ARG1: his request for a presidential disaster declaration for the Big Island] [ARGM-TMP: as the state copes with Kilauea volcano 's eruption] .
